QuestData.Title: Oculeth's Workshop
QuestData.Description:
We need to make contact with Chief Telemancer Oculeth, the man who developed Suramar's teleportation network.
Oculeth had a workshop in old Suramar, from the age before the Sundering. He may be taking refuge there.
<Thalyssra presses a small coin into your palm.>
If you find him, show him this. Hopefully you see him before he sees you...
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the First Arcanist's Token to Chief Telemancer Oculeth.
QuestData.RewardText: You may deliver me to Thalyssra once my work here is complete.
